events.name: Hanuman Jayanti 1
events.description: Please join us for the upcoming event, Hanuman Jayanti, full programme details is below. TEST DATA

events.name: Pau Bhajji - Place your orders
events.description: To place your orders contact/message your First/Last Name & quantity of portions. Each portion feeds 1 person.

events.name: Hanuman Jayanti
events.description: Please join us for the upcoming event,  Hanuman Jayanti on Saturday 31st March 2018, full programme details is below.

events.name: H.H. Acharya Shree Koshalendraprasadji Maharaj
events.description:
It’s our pleasure to inform all the devotees that Acharya Maharaj Shree 1008 Koshalendraprasadji Maharaj and learned Saints from Shree Swaminarayan Mandir, Kalupur, Ahmedabad will be coming to Sydney. 
Arrives in Sydney on Friday 23/03/18 @8:25pm on MH141
Departs Sydney for Auckland on Thursday 29/03/28 @ 11:35am on QF145.
Acharya Maharaj will be gracing our sabha on Saturday 24th March 2018 from 7.30pm. We invite all devotees to come for Darshan and Arshivachan

events.name: Ram Navmi & Shree Hari Jayanti
events.description:
Join us to celebrate the upcoming Ram Navmi / Shree Swaminarayan Jayanti - Sunday 25th March 2018.

12:00pm(Afternoon) - Shree Ram Bhagwan Pragatiya Aarti

Evening
5:30pm - 6:30pm - Nitya Niyam, Katha
6:30pm - 6:45pm - Abhishek
6:45pm - 7:00pm - Thaal & Janma Utsav Aarti

events.name: Santo Vidaygiri & Prasad Roopi Bhojan
events.description:
You are invited to attend the evening sabha hosted by Santo from Bhuj Mandir & vidaygiri sabha for the Santo on Wednesday 21st March 2018 from 7.00pm.

Note: Prasad Roopi Bhojan will be served after the sabha.

events.name: 3 Day Special Seminar
events.description:
You are invited to attend a  3-Day Special evening sabha where Santo from Bhuj Mandir will be hosting a Gnaan (Knowledge) seminar to help us get one step closer to Bhagwan.
Friday 16th March 2018 commencing at 7.30pm
Saturday 17th March 2018 commencing at 6.00pm. Note: Prasad Roopi Bhojan will be served.
Sunday 18th March commencing at 6.00pm

events.name: GHANSHYAM FAMILY FUN DAY
events.description:
Your family, friends and you are invited to ‘Ghanshyam Family Fun Day.’

The event will involve participating in outdoor field team/individual games for both males & females.

All age groups are encouraged to join the games so make sure you are wearing comfortable footwear. If you want to just relax feel free to bring your own picnic mats/chairs and don't forget your sun scream/hat. 

Sunday 18th March 2018 from 10.00am to 2.00pm.
Note: Opening ceremony & Aarti will commence at 9.00am & thereafter teams will be created.

Venue: Tallawong Oval Tallawong Avenue, Blacktown. For direction to the venue: https://goo.gl/DLz63V

Lunch will be served.

events.name: Katha Parayan 2018
events.description:
Shree Shatananand Swami rachit Shree Janmamangal Katha has been organised at Shree Swaminarayan Temple – Sydney. 

Please come and listen to the Katha by learned Saints from Shree Swaminarayan Temple – Bhuj Kutch, India.

Katha will commence on Wednesday, 7th March 2018 to 11th March 2018.

events.name: Narnarayan Dev Jayanti - 2018
events.description:
Saturday 3rd March 2017 is Shree NarNarayan Dev Jayanti the festival of Fuldol Utsav.

Note: Fuldol Utsav aarti will commence at 7.00pm.

events.name: Holi Utsav 2018
events.description:
Join in and let’s play Holi!

Thursday 1st March 2018 is Holi the festival of colours. Holika Dahan Poojan will commence outdoors from 7.00pm onwards.

Note: Coloured water will be provided onsite, please bring along your water guns to join in.

events.name: Life Style Seminar - Let's change the world
Maha Shivratri Utsav 2018
events.description:
Please join us for the upcoming event, Maha Shivratri -  Tuesday, 13th February 2018 at Shree Swaminarayan Temple - Sydney.
Shiv Poojan & Aarti will be held @ 8.00pm
If you would like to be yajman for this utsav, please contact the sevaks inside the Mandir Kothar:
Poojan Yajman $51
Prasad Yajman $101
Note: On this utsav day vrat upvaas is to be observed by devotees. Milk for Abhishek will be provided by the Mandir.

events.name: Maha Pooja - Sunday 11th February 2018
events.description:
All devotees are invited to join Maha Pooja which will be conducted on Sunday 11th February 2018, promptly starting at 6.30am in the presence of Bhuj Mandir Santo.

Please register your names to the mandir Kothar with a seva/donation of $11.00.

Jay Shree Swaminarayan

events.name: Night Sabha - 2018
events.description:
Please join us for a special unique Night Sabha that will take us a step closer to Maharaj. The sabha will be presented by santo from Bhuj Mandir.
Friday 9th February 2018 from 7.30pm.
Prasad Roopi Bhojan will be served
 
Saturday 10th February 2018 from 6.00pm
Shaak Utsaav & Prasad Roopi Bhojan will be served
Thakarhali Raas Utsav

events.name: Lunar Eclipse
events.description:
Please be advised that there is a Lunar Eclipse in Sydney on Wednesday, 31st January 2018 at 10:48pm. 
 
Eclipse Fast 
Stop eating (Drinking of water is allowed) - Wednesday, 31st January 2018 at 01:48pm 
 
Stop Drinking of water - Wednesday, 31st January 2018 at 07:48pm 
 
Eclipse Starts 
Refrain from touching of clothes - Wednesday, 31st January 2018 at 10:48pm. 
 
Eclipse Ends 
Take shower/bath with any touched clothes - Thursday, 01st February 2018 at 02:11am

events.name: Vasant Panchmi & Shikshapatri Jayanti
events.description:
On Monday, 22th January 2018, we will be celebrating Vasant Panchmi & Shikshapatri Jayanti at Shree Swaminarayan Temple, Sydney.

Please join us to celebrate this occasion in the presence of santo from Bhuj Mandir. Requesting devotees to bring with them their personal Shikshapatri during the poojan. 

Detailed program is shown below:
 7:00pm - 7:30pm 	 Sandhya Aarti, Dhun, Stuti & Thaal
 7:30pm - 8:30pm 	 Shikshapatri Vachan with Poojan
 8:30pm - 8:35pm 	 Shikshapatri Aarti
 8:35pm - 9:00pm 	 Kirtan, Dhun & Chesta
Lord Shree Swaminarayan, gifted mankind 212 versed Shikshapatri for the welfare of His disciples and whoever joins the sect. It serves as a fundamental code of conduct encompassing everything from basic civic norms i.e. from personal hygiene to social ethics, up to universal philosophy and spirituality. It is the essence of all the Scriptures including the Vedas. He Himself mentions within that His words are His form hence we worship the Shikshapatri on this day and pay our respectful obeisance unto Him; the benefactor of All.

events.name: 5th Patotsav  - Timetable of Events
events.description:
Join us for our 5th Anniversary Celebrations. The event will be graced by learned Saints from Shree Swaminarayan Temple Bhuj, who will recite holy scripture Shreemad Satsangi Jeevan composed by Shatanand Muni. Be sure not to miss the divine wisdom within this scripture written as a discourse between Suvrat Muni and Pratapsinhraja on the divine banks of Chakratirth.

Mahotsav Timeline of Events

15-01-2018 = Monday
Morning
11:30am: Vastu Poojan of the new Shree Ghanshyam Academy in presence of Saints
Evening
8pm: Welcoming ceremony for the Saints from Bhuj Mandir
 
16-01-2018 = Tuesday
Morning
9am: Purify ceremony for those Haribhaktos sitting for the Vishnuyag Havan
Evening
6pm Sandhya Aarti
7pm: Pothi Yatra with Band & Lezium playing along
After Pothi yatra Deep Pragatiya and Welcoming ceremony of Shree Narnarayan dev Gadi His Holiness Archaya 1008 Shree Kolshendraprasadji maharaj.
Welcoming ceremony of local and overseas guests.
8pm to 9pm: Prasadroop bhojan will be served

17-01-2018 = Wednesday
Morning
8am Aarti
8.30am: Katha Poojan
8.30am Start of Vishnuyaag
9.30am to 10.30am: Morning Katha
10.30am to 11.00am: Vyakhan Mala by Swami Shreerangdasji
Evening
6.30pm: Aarti
7pm to 8pm: Evening Katha with Janmotsav utsav of Shree Ghanshyam Maharaj
8pm to 9pm: Prasadroop Bhojan after Katha
9pm to 10pm: History Quiz Night
 
18-01-2018 = Thursday
Morning
7:30am in the Presence of His Holiness His Holiness Acharya 1008 Shree Kolshendraprasadji maharaj, Bhuj Mandir saints, Abhisek Poojan of Shree Ghanshyam Maharaj after poojan Maha Abhisek thereafter Abhishek Aarti
8am Aarti
9am to 10am: Katha
10:00am: Ankoot Utsav, Ankoot Aarti
10:30am: Flag ceremony on top of Shikar afterwards Grand Opening Ceremony of the new Shree Ghanshyam Academy with the Presence of His Holiness His Holiness Archaya 1008 Shree Kolshendraprasadji maharaj, Bhuj Mandir Mahant Swami Purani Dharmananad Swami.
Afternoon
12pm: Vishuyaag Closing Ceremony
12.30pm Prasadroop Bhojan
Evening
6.30pm: Aarti
7pm to 8pm: Evening Katha with Shree Swaminarayan Bhagwan Gadi pithabishek utsav afterwards Maha Aarti
8pm to 9pm: Prasadroop Bhojan after Katha
9pm to 10pm: Gents Stage Program

19-01-2018 = Friday
Morning
8am Aarti
9am to 10am: Katha
10am: Vyakhan Mala by Swami Ghanshyamswarupdasji
Evening
6.30pm: Aarti
7pm to 8pm: Evening Katha with Shree Swaminarayan Bhagwan no Pushpdolstsav celebration 
8pm to 9pm: Prasadroop Bhojan after Katha
9pm to 10pm: Gents Stage Program

20-01-2018 = Saturday
Morning
9am to 10am: Morning Katha
10am: Vyakhan Mala by Swami Ishwarswarupdasji
Evening
4pm to 6pm: Shree Ghanshyam Maharaj Rajupchar Utsav with presence of Band and Leziem Team
6.30pm: Aarti
7pm to 8pm: Evening Katha with Shree Swaminarayan Bhagwan no Deepotsav utsav
8pm to 9pm: Prasadroop Bhojan after Katha
9pm to 10pm:  Kirtan- Sangeet along with Raasutsav
 
21-01-2018 = Sunday
Morning
6:30am to 7:30am: Mahapooja
9am to 10am: Morning Katha
10am: Vyakhan Mala by Swami Harimukhanddasji
Blessings from Vadil Santos
Mahotsav Closing Ceremony
 
Note: Chadravs for the mini katha utsav will be carried on Tuesday 16th January 2018.

Your assistance is required for Prasad Roop bhojan preparation on the following:
Tuesday 16th at 2pm
Wednesday 17th at 9am for Ankoot preparation & 2pm for evening preparation
Thursday 18th at 4am for Ankoot preparation
Friday 19th at 2pm
Saturday 20th at 7am
Sunday 21st at 7am
